WorkItem.Description:
Comparing the stats displayed by Rawr b4.0.10.0 to the in-game tooltip, it appears that 10 points of base Int does not contribute to spell power. For Instance, the in-game tooltip for my Tauren Druid untalented and ungeared has an Int of 152 but a spell power of 142. Changing CalculationMoonkin.cs to use:
float spellPowerFromStats = (float)Math.Floor(spellDamageFromIntPercent * stats.Intellect) - 10;
Makes Rawr and the ingame tooltip agree talented and untalented, with and without gear.
Â 
WoW also appears to ignore base Spirit when giving bonus hit based on spirit.  Changing CalculationMoonkin.cs to use:
statsTotal.HitRating += 0.5f * character.DruidTalents.BalanceOfPower * (statsTotal.Spirit - 175);
fixed hit to match between the ingame tooltip and Rawr. This fix works for me but a more comprehensive fix is likely needed for different races of druid.
